history.content:
Many people will drop after Homework 2 almost every spring for 189. Based on prior experience, there will be open seats then.

Also they're going to open up ~300 more seats, which will probably be reserved for eecs/cs depending on when they're made available. If they process your declaration in time, then you should be able to get in. Even if that isn't the case, try enrolling regardless, 189 has *lots* of people drop
Many people will drop after Homework 2 almost every spring for 189. Based on prior experience, there will be open seats then.

children.subject:
As far as declaration goes, you won’t officially get declared until sometime in January, about 3-4 weeks after grades are officially recorded.  So for Spring 2020, you wouldn’t get priority.  

If you’re saying that all your prereqs are already completed, not sure if CS will process right away, you would need to ask CS advising on that.

history.content:
The wait list was recently expanded so you should try again to get on it.

In a 'normal' upper div CS class...if you join the wait list when you are undeclared and then are approved to join the major before the adjustment period begins on Jan 6th, then the system would enroll you ahead of undeclared folks - assuming there were open seats in the class. Once you are declared, the system updates & becomes aware of your changed status & then processes your enrollment based on the current enrollment rules @ the time. If you become declared AFTER the adjustment period opens on Jan 6th, you would be given no priority enrollment since the reserve capacities come down at the end of phase 2.

So, I'm doing good in my final prerequisite and about to declare CS major. And I really want to get in 189 next semester because I'm in 126 now and enjoy it. 

But, because I'm technically still undeclared I don't even have access to waitlist 189 at the moment - I wonder whether 189 will be open again, and is there a chance for me to get in this class, and if so , how big is the chance.

Many thanks, friends.!
history.subject: About to declare - Will I get priority out of the waitlist?
